name: Metal in Motion (C1PH3R Dev)
description:
A simple game about rolling a ball to push other balls into goals. The game currently has 5 levels and has a speedrun timer implemented for all levels. The game also saves your best times per level. Based off of prototype from Udemy Course Pro Unreal Engine Game Coding by Rob Baker. The Source Code for the game is public and can be found on my Github.

Controls:

WASD to move, Spacebar to Jump and Q to Dash.

Planned Updates:
  • More levels with more advanced gameplay mechanics.
  • Fix bug that causes fastest overall speedrun time to not be saved.
